discord-desc: The description used for the Discord extension
discord-talk:
Short for "talk".

Used as the text for $2 in {{msg-mw|discord-userlinks}}
discord-contribs:
Short for "contributions".

Used as the text for $3 in {{msg-mw|discord-userlinks}}
discord-diff: Used as the text for $1 in discord-revisionlinks
discord-minor:
Short for "minor edit". The letter should be the same as in {{msg-mw|Minoreditletter}}.

Used as the text for $2 in {{msg-mw|discord-revisionlinks}}.
discord-msg-page-edited:
Message sent to Discord for when a page edit is made. Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks
* $2 - Page link
* $3 - discord-revisionlinks
* $4 - Summary (always surrounded in tildes)
discord-msg-page-created:
Message sent to Discord for when a page creation is made. Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks
* $2 - Page link
* $3 - discord-revisionlinks
* $4 - Summary (always surrounded in tildes)
discord-msg-page-deleted:
Message sent to Discord when a page is deleted. Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks
* $2 - Page link
* $3 - Reason (always surrounded in tildes)
* $4 - Number of revisions deleted
discord-msg-undeleted-revs: Used as the text for $2 in discord-msg-page-undeleted if revisions are being undeleted rather than a page
discord-msg-page-undeleted:
Message sent to Discord when pages/revisions are undeleted.
Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks
* $2 - discord-msg-undeleted-revs
* $3 - Page link
* $4 - Comment (always surrounded in tildes)
discord-msg-rev-visibility-changed:
Message sent to Discord when the visibility of revisions is changed.
Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks
* $2 - Number of revisions
* $3 - Page link
discord-msg-page-protect:
Message sent to Discord when an article's protection is changed.
Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks
* $2 - Page link
* $3 - Reason (always surrounded in tildes)
* $4 - Protection settings
discord-msg-page-moved:
Message sent to Discord when an article is moved. Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks
* $2 - Old page link
* $3 - New page link
* $4 - Reason (always surrounded in tildes)
* $5 - discord-revisionlinks
discord-msg-user-registered:
Message sent to Discord when a user registers.
Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks
discord-msg-user-block:
Message sent to Discord when a user is blocked. Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks (performer)
* $2 - discord-userlinks (target)
* $3 - Reason (always surrounded in tildes)
* $4 - Expiry text (using discord-msg-user-block-timeformat)
discord-msg-user-block-partial:
Message sent to Discord when a user is blocked partially. Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks (performer)
* $2 - discord-userlinks (target)
* $3 - Reason (always surrounded in tildes)
* $4 - Expiry text (using discord-msg-user-block-timeformat)
discord-msg-user-unblock:
Message sent to Discord when a user is unblocked. Parameters:
$1 - discord-userlinks (performer)
$2 - discord-userlinks (target)
discord-msg-user-groups-changed:
Message sent to Discord when a user's group is changed. Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks (performer)
* $2 - discord-userlinks (target)
* $3 - Reason (always surrounded in tildes)
* $4 - Added rights (prepended by +)
* $5 - Removed rights (prepended by -)
discord-msg-file-upload-new: Used as the text for $2 in discord-msg-file-upload
discord-msg-file-upload:
Message sent to Discord when an upload is made. Parameters:

* $1 - discord-userlinks
* $2 - discord-msg-file-upload-new
* $3 - File link
* $4 - Comment (always surrounded in tildes)
* $5 - Size (formatted as KB/MB/GB)
* $6 - File width
* $7 - File height
* $8 - File MIME type
discord-msg-file-delete:
Message sent to Discord when a file version is deleted (not an entire file).
Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks
* $2 - File link
* $3 - Comment (always surrounded in tildes)
discord-msg-file-undelete:
Message sent to Discord when a file version is restored (not an entire file).
Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks
* $2 - File link
* $3 - Comment (always surrounded in tildes)
discord-msg-import:
Message sent to Discord when a page is imported. Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks
* $2 - Page link
* $3 - Number of revisions in XML file
* $4 - Number of revisions successfully imported
discord-msg-page-merge:
Message sent to Discord when page histories are merged. Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks
* $2 - Target link
* $3 - Destination link
discord-msg-ext-approvedrevs-approved:
Message sent to Discord when a revision is approved (Approved Revs extension).
Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks (admin user)
* $2 - Target link
* $3 - Revision link or ID
* $4 - discord-userlinks (revision author) or ID
discord-msg-ext-approvedrevs-unapproved:
Message sent to Discord when a revision is unapproved (Approved Revs extension).
Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks (admin user)
* $2 - Target link
discord-msg-ext-approvedrevs-approved-fi:
Message sent to Discord when a file revision is approved (Approved Revs extension).
Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks (admin user)
* $2 - Target link
* $3 - SHA of uploaded file
* $4 - discord-userlinks (revision author)
discord-msg-ext-approvedrevs-unapproved-:
Message sent to Discord when a file revision is unapproved (Approved Revs extension).
Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks (admin user)
* $2 - Target link
discord-msg-user-rename:
Message sent to Discord when a user is renamed.
Parameters:
* $1 - discord-userlinks (admin user)
* $2 - Old username
* $3 - New username link
